projects.title: Autonomous Air Hockey Robot
projects.description: As part of our senior design course we were tasked with building a robot to play air hockey autonomously.

projects.title: pyloudnorm
projects.description: Flexible perceptual audio loudness meter in Python based on the ITU-R BS.1770-4 loudness algorithm.

projects.title: NeuralReverberator
projects.description: VST plugin built with MATLAB for AI driven reverberation synthesis using a spectral autoencoder.

projects.title: auxCord
projects.description: Leveraging the Spotify API to help friends build playlists with music everyone will enjoy.

projects.title: Cinuosity
projects.description: Discover new genres, styles, and artists that you haven't heard before by injecting a bit of randomness into the process.

projects.title: Phase Analysis Plugin
projects.description: Gain insight about the relative phase relationship of audio signals to help audio engineers with drum overhead microphone placement.

projects.title: Remote Lock Controller
projects.description: An affordable as well as expandable remote controllable lock system operated via a mobile app.

projects.title: Passive Monitor Controller
projects.description: Design and assembly of a completely passive monitor controller for studio use.

projects.title: LED Binary Clock
projects.description: Process of designing and building an Arduino based clock that tells the time in binary.

projects.title: ATX Power Supply Conversion
projects.description: Converting an old ATX power supply from a computer into a repurposed DC bench power supply.
